Campanella (Gitan/SP-U) 464
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): Passwords List: Gitan: Campanella (Gitan/SP-U) 464
By Gizmo the Lemur on Thursday, November 28, 2002 - 09:23 am:

Right now it can only be made through mixing two monsters with an item called "Whitespear". You can find it in an expedition trip in a site called Promiass. Promiass is unlocked once you beat the game, and hit "Master rank" (You have to beat the game to get the site due to the storyline).

stats:
Pow 125
Int 160
Acc 125
Spd 130
Def 70
Lif 80

Char:
It's kinda hard to say. I mixed my 1st gen Gitan with my 1st Gen Xtal Dragon so I can't confirm any of the characteristics other than Up Spear, and maybe Up mind.

By Avion on Sunday, June 22, 2003 - 10:30 pm:

Due to extensive research, I have found Campanella's password! GALAXY is the password.
Stats: See above note.
Char.: Forgot. Don't have my gameboy in front of me. I think UpFire and something.

By Vega on Saturday, June 28, 2003 - 06:23 pm:

it is up spear
